name: DRDGOLD Limited
description: DRDGOLD Limited is a South African gold mining company primarily engaged in the recovery of gold from tailings dams. Established in 2000, DRDGOLD focuses on the reclamation of previously mined gold and aims to create a sustainable business model by utilizing advanced technologies and environmentally responsible practices. The company operates the Ergo Mining Proprietary Limited, which is known for its significant reclamation operations in the Witwatersrand region, one of the world's richest gold mining areas. DRDGOLD employs innovative techniques such as centralized processing and carbon-in-leach technology to optimize gold recovery rates while minimizing environmental impacts. The company's commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to rehabilitate mining land and reduce the carbon footprint associated with mining activities. DRDGOLD has positioned itself as a leader in the gold recovery sector, addressing the challenges of declining ore grades and rising operational costs. With a strategic focus on operational excellence, the company continues to enhance its production capabilities while maintaining a strong emphasis on safety and social responsibility.

faq.answer: DRDGOLD is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.

faq.answer: DRDGOLD's main products include gold recovered from tailings and other recycling processes.
